text: @realDonaldTrump @newtgingrich @foxandfriends U wanted to say "until electioneering and elections are over". Say it. Uare going to lose. U messed up COVID-19 & the tragic death of George Floyd. George's brother, Philonise says you did not even listen to him. One would not have expected better from you. You are condescending.
